channel.title: Messing around with icons above head (works for servers!) (H)
channel.description:
Screenies:
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img71.imageshack.us/img71/404/properprayericon8yz.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/3986/multiprayericons3sx.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/435/darkprayicon5ni.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/8273/redskullicontykevin6ql.png[/img][/url]
Ty for red skull kevin, I don't regret myself telling you how to do this ;)
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/2461/roflheadiconz0db.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/494/headiconzb33ch7el.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/3013/cbhead16gu.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/1937/cbhead25cx.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/1006/cbhead36tn.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/4207/cbhead45on.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/8783/mageiconz0yi.png[/img][/url]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/3739/attackicon0lp.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img112.imageshack.us/img112/2310/multistats3pw.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/9421/helmetmeinvisiblez4qf.png[/img][/URL]
Yeah I messed around with the client bit so it works =D but will crash other peoples client unless they use mine heh, just thought I'd show off and post here ^_^
[quote="wL, post:6, topic:3583"]It's because you use data files from a newer version which are not 100% compatible to 317. At some point there was a change in the head icon files, but I don't remeber at which version the change was. So either you use a 317 cache, port the server to a new client or backport the changes to the 317 client.[/quote]
Thanks winterlove for telling me that otherwise I wouldn't of thought of this idea :D

item.title: Messing around with icons above head (works for servers!) (H)
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

[quote="~Alex~, post:13, topic:3881"]MUAHAHA, that’s me being annoying on msn, btw I did find a version of your client that actually worked, and today you found the Red Skull head icon, I was there when you found it lol, only problem was when I teleported to you… my client got pwned by your awsome discovery, and my clients lack of support for it.

EDIT: Dude, sooner or later when everyone has a client that supports head icons, you can make it so Admins have the gold crowns above their heads at all times, lol.

EDIT2: I also heard about something that MrWicked discovered involving placing things, like golden crowns for example, in different places.
MrWicked, I heard you made it so when an admin is on the minimap, it shows a golden crown instead of a dot, how did you figure out how to do that lol?[/quote]

Actually I was the first one to put things in different places if read my other thread XD, but MrWicked made it for his server so that you could see other admins on mini map with a gold crown

Read full topic

@_Alex wrote:

MUAHAHA, that’s me being annoying on msn, btw I did find a version of your client that actually worked, and today you found the Red Skull head icon, I was there when you found it lol, only problem was when I teleported to you… my client got pwned by your awsome discovery, and my clients lack of support for it.

EDIT: Dude, sooner or later when everyone has a client that supports head icons, you can make it so Admins have the gold crowns above their heads at all times, lol.

EDIT2: I also heard about something that MrWicked discovered involving placing things, like golden crowns for example, in different places.
MrWicked, I heard you made it so when an admin is on the minimap, it shows a golden crown instead of a dot, how did you figure out how to do that lol?

cheese, thats great! did you have to modify the client so that it would load any image, rather than just prayer, or could it already do that?[/quote]

item.title: Messing around with icons above head (works for servers!) (H)
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Screenies:

Ty for red skull kevin, I don’t regret myself telling you how to do this

Yeah I messed around with the client bit so it works =D but will crash other peoples client unless they use mine heh, just thought I’d show off and post here

Why don't prayer/skull icons above heads work in 317 deobs?

It’s because you use data files from a newer version which are not 100% compatible to 317. At some point there was a change in the head icon files, but I don’t remeber at which version the change was. So either you use a 317 cache, port the server to a new client or backport the changes to the 317 client.

Thanks winterlove for telling me that otherwise I wouldn’t of thought of this idea

Read full topic
item.source: Messing around with icons above head (works for servers!) (H)
